         <tei-zone points="919,1871 919,2026 2159,2026 2159,1871" id="eSc_textblock_778d31fa" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
         <tei-zone points="755,2039 755,2485 2329,2485 2329,2039" id="eSc_textblock_98250902" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
         <tei-zone points="694,2516 694,2665 2399,2665 2399,2516" id="eSc_textblock_aea977b8" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
         <tei-zone points="2567,2741 2563,2820 2350,2820 2350,2948 682,2959 682,2856 518,2856 518,2750" id="eSc_textblock_34901235" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
         <tei-zone points="2097,3315 1249,3306 998,3322 998,3035 2110,3035 2110,3321 2097,3321" id="eSc_textblock_cdb62251" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
         <tei-zone points="1730,3500 1730,3227 1393,3227 1393,3500" id="eSc_textblock_94049306" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>

      </tei-surface>
   </tei-facsimile>
   <tei-text data-origname="text">
      <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_eb938c75" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
        <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
            <tei-desc data-origname="desc">
                Walter Giesiking sitting at the piano.
            </tei-desc>
        </tei-figure>
      </tei-div>
      <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_778d31fa" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
         <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-hi rendition="#larger" class="larger" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118694820" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">WALTER GIESEKING</tei-persName>
            </tei-hi>
        </tei-div>
      <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_98250902" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
         <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The phenomenal success of this artist recently at his first concert here con-
         <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>firmed the fame that preceded him from abroad.
         <tei-seg ana="#immediate_recognizability" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
            His expectant <tei-placeName data-origname="placeName">New York</tei-placeName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>audience at once recognized his native genius, genuine musicianship, and
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>brilliant command of the piano.
         </tei-seg> Impressed with
         <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
            the accuracy and perfection
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of the first recordings of his playing by <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte Mignon
            <tei-hi rendition="#i" class="i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">Licensee</tei-hi></tei-name>
         </tei-seg>, for which
         <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>he records exclusively, he said:
         <tei-quote type="testimonial" data-origname="quote" data-origatts="type">
            "The reproduction of my playing on the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte Mignon <tei-hi rendition="#i" class="i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">Licensee</tei-hi></tei-name>
            is by far the most complete and the truest that I
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>have yet heard, and surpasses by far all my anxiously awaited expectations.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>I am filled with truly unbiased admiration."
         </tei-quote>
        </tei-div>
      <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_aea977b8" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
         <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
         <tei-hi rendition="#c" class="c" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
            You may select the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon Licensee</tei-name> in 115 Makes of Pianos
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>A Most Interesting Art Brochure Is Yours for the Asking
         </tei-hi>
      </tei-div>
      <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_34901235" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
        <tei-hi rendition="#c" class="c" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">AUTO PNEUMATIC ACTION COMPANY</tei-orgName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName data-origname="persName">William C. Heaton, President</tei-persName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-address data-origname="address">
                653 West 51st. Street <tei-space dim="horizontal" data-origname="space" data-origatts="dim" data-empty=""/> New York
            </tei-address>
        </tei-hi>
    </tei-div>
        
      <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_cdb62251" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
         <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte Mignon</tei-name>
         <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-seg type="slogan" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type">THE MASTER'S FINGERS ON YOUR PIANO</tei-seg>
        </tei-div>

      <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_94049306" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
        <tei-seg ana="#phantom_body" resp="#np" type="topics" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc data-origname="desc">
                    Semitransparent hands on a piano as parts of the 
                    company logo.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-seg>
      </tei-div>
   </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
